name: Area 51 Escape (BenChittenden)
description:
You are the last guard alive in Area 51.

You must traverse your way through the labyrinthian warehouse to find three keycards that unlock the exit door. Taking down anything and everything that comes at you.

You only have one life, if you are hit even once you are killed so be careful! You move with WASD and shoot with the space bar.

By Ben Chittenden, Toby Carlyon and Vaughan Smith
